locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Lütfen geçerli bir başlanğıç tarihi seçiniz.
Lütfen geçerli bir son tarih seçiniz

Select a date to remove records from the logs. Any log entries made prior to the selected date will be deleted. Note that this only effects the Timed Views plugin and not view counts made elsewhere (e.g. for the general Views plugin).
Bu kaydı silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz? Bu süreç tamamlanamayabilir.
This plugin implements a CSV report describing readership for each article, filtered by a user-defined timespan.
Check to use statistics retrieved by the old Timed View plugin. If you want to generate a timed view report with new statistics data, leave this field unchecked.

When selecting a long time period with a large set of statistics data, this report might take a while to be ready. If it takes too much time, the connection might time out and you will not receive the report file. If this happens, try again with a smaller time period.
